Python-AD uses the Mercurial version control system. As Google code does not currently support Mercurial, we make use of the excellent [http://freehg.org freeHg Mercurial hosting] service.

=== Checking out the Code ===

You can check out the latest source code using the command.

{{{
  hg clone http://freehg.org/u/geertj/python-ad
}}}

=== Web Access ===

You can also [http://freehg.org/u/geertj/python-ad/ browse the source code] through the web.
